ygData.subject: Gargoyle Carapace
ygData.msgSnippet: Just to let you know the Basalt Carapace item is also NO DROP.  Someone was shouting that it was on a corpse if anyone wanted it in Lower Guk last night.
ygData.messageBody:
Just to let you know the Basalt Carapace item is also
NO DROP. Someone was shouting that it was on a corpse
if anyone wanted it in Lower Guk last night.
Unfortunately I was down in the Frenzy room trying to
get a sash.

So I assume that all the items we need are NO DROP,
except maybe the Lambent Stones? I for one hope most
of the stuff we need is NO DROP, would keep things
more interesting. Although, my Gypsy Lute did not get
changed to NO DROP after the patch, so who knows.


Jada MacAldred
Bard of the 40th Chorus
Povar




=====
